node.title: At least 2 dead at Arkansas nursing home as severe weather lashes the region
node.description: At least five other people at the Monette Manor nursing home sustained serious injuries, according to Craighead County Judge Marvin Day.
node.content: ["At least two people were killed at an Arkansas nursing home as severe weather lashed the region on Friday night, Craighead County Judge Marvin Day confirmed to CBS News. At least five other people at the Monette Manor nursing home sustained serious injuries.\u00a0", "The status of the remaining residents is not yet clear, Day said, but first responders are on the scene.\u00a0", "The casualties come as Arkansas and other southern states are predicted to face severe weather Friday night and through the weekend. The National Weather Service issued a tornado warning, which means a tornado has been sighted or indicated by weather radar, for the southeastern part of Craighead County, where the nursing home is located.\u00a0", "A tornado warning has also been issued for Paducah, Kentucky, and tornadoes have been spotted in Arkansas and Tennessee.\u00a0", "This is a developing story. It will be updated.\u00a0", "Victoria Albert is a News Editor at CBS News. Reach her at victoria.albert@viacomcbs.com"]
